title: The Berenstain Bears and the Sitter
description: This classic Berenstain Bears story is the perfect way to introduce children to what happens when a babysitter comes to watch them!Come for a visit in Bear Country with this classic First Time BookÂ® from Stan and Jan Berenstain. Mama and Papa are going out for the evening, so Mrs. Grizzle is coming to babysit Brother and Sister. Fun games will be played, and at bedtime, the cubs will be tucked snug into their beds. Includes over 50 bonus stickers!
author: Stan Berenstain
